Sentencas: The effect of La0:7Sr0:3MnO3-delta (LSM) coating on SS446 steel on air oxidation at 800 degrees C was investigated by transmission electron microscopy.
Titulo: Transmission electron microscopy characterization of protective La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-δ coatings prepared by electrostatic spray deposition on ferritic alloy

Sentencas: Dense and crack free thin LSM films were prepared by electrostatic spray deposition.
Titulo: Transmission electron microscopy characterization of protective La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-δ coatings prepared by electrostatic spray deposition on ferritic alloy

Sentencas: The microstructural characterization was carried out on coated and uncoated interconnectors.
Titulo: Transmission electron microscopy characterization of protective La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-δ coatings prepared by electrostatic spray deposition on ferritic alloy

Sentencas: A thin chromia scale at the alloy interface along with two spinel phases were observed after long term oxidation in both cases.
Titulo: Transmission electron microscopy characterization of protective La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-δ coatings prepared by electrostatic spray deposition on ferritic alloy

Sentencas: Specimens exhibit, in addition, an SiO2 layer at the interface with steel due to the high content of Si in the steel.
Titulo: Transmission electron microscopy characterization of protective La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-δ coatings prepared by electrostatic spray deposition on ferritic alloy

Sentencas: Significant changes in the thickness, morphology and composition occurred in the reaction layer for the LSM coated steel.
Titulo: Transmission electron microscopy characterization of protective La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-δ coatings prepared by electrostatic spray deposition on ferritic alloy

Sentencas: These effects are explained on the basis of changes in the diffusive fluxes during exposure to the oxidation treatment.
Titulo: Transmission electron microscopy characterization of protective La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-δ coatings prepared by electrostatic spray deposition on ferritic alloy

Sentencas: The implications of these effects for the degradation mechanism of LSM-based interconnects are discussed.
Titulo: Transmission electron microscopy characterization of protective La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-δ coatings prepared by electrostatic spray deposition on ferritic alloy
